page.title: 06Sailing Club
page.content: {Waldringfield Sailing Club}has a {clubhouse}on the river foreshore SW of the Maybush Pub,with its own private car park above, on the wooded river bank.At present there are over{600} members + as well as much private sailing there is a strong emphasis on encouraging young people to sail. The club owns{30 Cadet dinghies}and run a junior sailing week each summer,with 12 instructors for 24 children. Dinghies sailed include 1 man OKs and 2 man Cadets,Larks,Enterprises + Wayfarers.Keeled botas include 2 man Squibs and Yachts for more than 2 people. During the{summer}there are races every{Saturday},with occasional Trophy races,with handicapping,on some {Sundays and Bank Holidays.}
